description:
The year is ending, but not without one last free Porto JavaScript Community meetup, supported by the ScaleUp Porto initiative.

We're getting ambitious, so we'll have three speakers again!
We'll be welcoming André Cruz (https://twitter.com/satazor), Founder & CTO at MOXY, André Garzia (https://twitter.com/soapdog), Tech Speaker at Mozilla, and Alex Potsides (https://twitter.com/achingbrain), Core JavaScript Developer at Protocol Labs, who'll be gracing us with three tech talks, and a lot of unexpected errors.

🤤Afterwards we're not going out for the traditional meetup dinner, but we're staying at Pólo Zero for the first ever:
🍕OPO.js Pizza party 🍕, where we'll continue the networking and geek talk while stuffing our faces in pizza.
⚠️The Pizza Party is also free but registration is mandatory so please let us know if you're staying by answering the extra question on the RSVP, so we can order accordingly.

👉 You can check the last OPO.js meetup, with photos and full talks in video here: https://medium.com/oponetwork/opo-js-meetup-7-wrapping-up-c2870313f33d
👉Want to be a speaker in 2019? Go to: https://opo.network/speaker
👉Subscribe to our monthly Porto Tech & Creative Events calendar here: https://opo.network/calendar

👉 Don’t forget to follow us on social media, we're adding a bunch of curated content just for you:
https://twitter.com/oponetwork
https://facebook.com/oponetwork
https://instagram.com/oponetwork
https://medium.com/oponetwork
name: OPO.js Meetup #8
